PHP Helpers
===========

Various reusable PHP helpers. The helpers in this package are framework-agnostic.

## Install

Via Composer

``` bash
$ composer require masikonis/php-helpers
```

## Usage

``` php
// Any input is transformed to more readable output and the execution is stopped
ddd(array('foo' => 'bar'));
```
